backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types, authorization and storage mixins, and domain models for admin users, vehicles, promotions, blogs, media assets, and interactions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new mainBannerImageUrls field to the actor state, defaulting it to an empty array.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and recent UI/feature changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML template loading the React app entry point and setting favicon and metadata.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to redeploy the frontend canister and verify key routes and media authorization behavior.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard controlling admin access with optional emergency bypass and loading or redirect states.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation, active-state detection, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Utilities for storing, retrieving, migrating, and clearing admin session data using localStorage and cookies.
Debug-only config enabling unconditional admin access and auto-creating a Super Admin session.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a button redirecting to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminPageH: Simple header component for admin pages with title, subtitle, and optional action element.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts and managing comments with form state and mutations.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, customizable columns, actions, and optional publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Home: Manages home page slider banner images allowing add, remove, reorder, and library selection with update persistence.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays and filters media assets with delete capability, handling loading and error states.
Dialog for browsing, searching, and selecting media assets with loading and error states.
Button that uploads image/video files by converting them to data URLs and creating media assets.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog component for creating or editing promotions with fields for text, date, image, and publish status.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog to create or edit customer testimonials including name, city, review, rating, image, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Comprehensive vehicle form dialog supporting basic info, media, variants, specs, and commercial features with save handling.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Editor with checkboxes to toggle boolean commercial vehicle feature flags.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Form for editing technical specs fields and managing a list of additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Interface to add, edit, delete vehicle variants and manage variant features and pricing adjustments.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on admin CMS entities using the actor API and session token.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder export maintained for compatibility; no functionality.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state, validating tokens, handling login, and supporting an emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Provides a debug interface to manually test admin login via the actor backend and display results.
Renders the main admin login form, handles authentication, redirects, and supports emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Loads and edits the admin user profile using CMS queries and displays a form for updating profile fields.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Implements blog post CRUD management including listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Displays dashboard statistics by aggregating counts from various CMS and public data queries.
Displays and manages contact form leads and credit simulations with search, tabs, and delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Provides media upload and management tools including homepage banner configuration and asset selection.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Lists, searches, creates, edits, and deletes promotions using a CRUD table and form dialog.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Manages customer testimonials with search, CRUD operations, and rating/review display.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Filters, displays, and manages vehicle entries by category with full CRUD capabilities.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Renders the admin visitor statistics page, fetching metrics and displaying them as stat cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/admin/styles/adminTheme.css: Defines the admin panel's theme variables and styles, including layout, navigation, typography, cards, and buttons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing configuration using TanStack Router for public and admin pages with layout wrappers and guards.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogComment: Provides a validated comment form supporting replies, form resets, and error handling for blog comments.
Displays nested blog comments with reply support, rendering top-level comments, their replies, and inline reply forms.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogInterac: Shows like, share, and comment actions for a blog post, handling local like state and interaction callbacks.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: A contact form that validates required fields, submits contact data via a mutation hook, and resets the form on success.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: A credit simulation request form that validates key fields, sends data through a mutation hook, and clears inputs after submission.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Implements a React error boundary that catches global errors and displays a fallback UI with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeMainBan: A banner slider that auto-rotates images when multiple URLs are provided and handles single or empty image cases.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: A footer displaying dealer info, contact details, social links, and visitor statistics.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Page layout wrapping content with navbar, hero section, CTA sections, footer, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: A mobile bottom action bar with call, WhatsApp, credit form sheet, and a popover navigation menu.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: A bottom sheet menu listing navigation links for mobile use.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: A responsive navigation bar with route links, WhatsApp CTA, and a slide-out mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/public/SectionTi: A reusable title component that displays an icon and centered heading text.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Renders a red call-to-action section with a WhatsApp contact button and heading.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a red hero banner with a welcome message and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Shows a vehicle card with image, details, price, feature badges, and links to detail or WhatsApp consult.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicles, promotions, blog data, interactions, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks visitors, page views, and periodic activity updates using backend mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, and custom animations for banners and CTAs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post with interactions, sharing, and comment thread management.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Fetches and lists published blog posts in a grid with previews and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle including variants, features, pricing, and contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists all published commercial vehicles grouped by category such as light, medium, and tractor head.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form along with contact info, map embed, and sales consultant details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing banners, featured vehicles, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed info for a selected passenger vehicle, including variants, pricing, and contact actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with a grid of vehicle cards and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Fetches and displays current promotions with images, descriptions, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows customer testimonials with ratings, images, and review text.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public/admin route lists and utilities for smoke testing and validating router configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings with additional plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project version, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for an automotive website with admin CMS, stable storage, and frontend/backend separation.
